reference.title: Error Messages
reference.shortdesc: The types of error messages you may encounter when using the Expansion Interface along with the microcomputer.

refsyn.p: There are three kinds of error messages you might get while using your computer:

ul.li: Boot errors, such as BOOT ERROR DC. See the Boot Errors Table for more information.
Operating system errors, such as ERROR 24 or FILE NOT FOUND. To get a brief description of a numbered error, type ERROR followed by the error number displayed. For example, type:

refsyn.p: For more information see the System Errors Table.

ul.li: Application program errors: see your application program manual.
